title: voyeur glitch.... go on and have a perv you know you want to.
body:
i found a glitch to view peoples entire champion page the one thats greyed out.

 view someones profile page then simply click on the view profile page icon and before your page fully loads up click champions and it should come up with that persons champ page.


go on have a perv at someone else's champ masteries.

replies.body: You do know that there are far more ways to look at someone's masteries than that right?

Or you open their profile, disconnect from internet, click yours, then reconnect.

Its old and its still there, like mid S3

> [{quoted}](name=CHEESYLEEKS,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=wlYLOVj8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-02T16:35:34.309+0000)
>
> cool. unsuccessful troll is unsuccessful

i dont get it
